project.Title: The Exorcist Class Mod
project.ItemDescription:
[i]"A man in a robe, claiming communion with the divine. Madness..."[/i]
[h1][b]Introduction[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1] The Exorcist is a group project mod that adds a brand new hero to Darkest Dungeon. This hero is completely custom, with all new sprites, skills, sounds, and animations, as well as a complete set of unique trinkets, alternate color palettes and team combos.
A religious offensive support, the Exorcist has a varied skill set that focuses on disrupting enemies and buffing allies. His unending war against demonkind has led this religious firebrand to the Hamlet, where he seeks to put his expertise in banishing otherworldly evil to good use.
[i]"A powerful disruptive combatant, the Exorcist calls upon his unwavering faith in combat to smite his foes, condemning them with holy magic. A lifetime of servitude has made him terrifyingly effective at banishing unholy monstrosities and eldritch evils. His knowledge of prayers allows him to fortify his teammates by rallying them to his zealous cause."[/i]
[h1][b]Comic[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/q19Xvdl.jpg[/img] [url=https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/493726737826578443/496306394157416468/exorcist_comic.png]Full Resolution Comic[/url]
[h1][b]Combat Skills[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1]
[b]Chastise[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/Mqu0VcZ.png[/img] XXOO OOXX [i]The Exorcist beats his enemies over the head with his prayer book, giving in to zealous ire.[/i]
Standard melee attack. Bonus crit chance vs Unholy or Eldritch.
[b]Word of Power[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/kP9af59.png[/img] OOXX OOOO [i]The Exorcist channels divine magic through his holy scepter, branding the wicked with the burning symbol of the Light.[/i]
Ranged attack. Lower damage, but gains a long lasting damage buff with each successful hit. Deals bonus damage vs Unholy or Eldritch.
[b]Perdition[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/rb0p6Nu.png[/img] OOOO OOOO [i]By the power vested in him by the church, the Exorcist condemns his enemies, marking them for eternal damnation.[/i]
Ranged skill. Mark, destealth, debuffs +crits received. Torch up.
[b]Vade Retro![/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/hQfZgEh.png[/img] XOOO OOXX [i]Light bursts from the pages of the holy text, blinding the Exorcist's enemies and sending them fleeing in terror.[/i]
Twice per battle. Enemy is pushed back 3, stunned and speed debuffed. Torch up.
[b]Benediction[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/LCjXO9K.png[/img] OOOO [i]The Exorcist performs a miracle, laying hands on his allies and curing their ailments.[/i]
Small heal. Removes stun, mark and horror. Speed down on self.
[b]Ashes to Ashes[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/V2q4JKZ.png[/img] OOOX O+O+O+O [i]The Exorcist lays the fallen to rest, strengthening his team's resolve.[/i]
Zero damage. Clears all corpses. Allies have a chance to heal a small amount of stress. Amount of stress healed is increased for every corpse cleared by the attack. Exorcist gains a small stress resist buff.
[b]Proselytize[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/S2SrQ8Y.png[/img] OOOO [i]The Light chooses a champion, rallying them to strike with newfound vigor, seeking out those marked for damnation.[/i]
Once per battle. Ally gains 1 block and a speed, crit and damage vs marked buff. Lasts until the end of combat.
[h1][b]Camping Skills[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1]
[b]Rallying Sermon[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/tX3k9YF.png[/img] Time Cost: 4 [i]The Exorcist rouses his teammates to his cause, inspiring them to fight in the name of the Light.[/i]
All other teammates gain +2 speed and +5 acc, and an extra +1 spd and +5 acc if religious. Lasts 4 battles.
[b]Ablution[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/fJGzgTo.png[/img] Time Cost: 4 [i]The Exorcist performs a cleansing ceremony, mending his allies' wounds and curing their ailments.[/i]
Ally is healed for 25% HP and cures bleed, blight and disease. Produces 1 Holy Water.
[b]Hallowed Ground[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/alcLyRc.png[/img] Time Cost: 4 [i]The Exorcist blesses the ground the team rest on, warding off the terrors of the night with a circle of prayer candles.[/i]
Prevents nighttime ambush. Party gains +10 dodge and +10% protection while the torch is above 75%. Lasts 4 battles.
[b]Rite of Exorcism[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/BWyq7p0.png[/img] Time Cost: 4 [i]The Exorcist applies his skills to a teammate, banishing a possessing demon from their bodies at a heavy toll.[/i]
One afflicted teammate is healed for 80 stress, but takes 40% of their HP in damage. Other teammates take 7 stress.
[h1][b]Other Information[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1] [list] [*]The Exorcist is religious. [*]He will only use the Abbey for stress relief. [*]He uses the Altar of Light district and starts with 1 Holy Water. [*]His default name is Maxwell. [*]On crit, he debuffs the enemy team's damage by 20%. [*]This mod comes with 10 class specific trinkets for Exorcist: 2 common, 1 uncommon, 1 rare, 1 very rare, 2 Crimson Court and 1 Color of Madness, as well as two Saintly Relics, special trinkets found only in the Ruins. [*]Additionally, the mod includes 1 new Collector head trinket, and 1 Exorcist trinket for the Sunward Isles mod. [*]The mod includes Pious and Skeptic as new quirks that buff/debuff the heals received from Benediction and Ashes to Ashes. [*]The Exorcist has 21 named party combos for you to discover. [*]He has a town event so you can get one immediately. [*]This mod is fully compatible with all 3 DLCs. [*]Exorcist currently supports German, Korean, Russian, Polish, French, Chinese, Portuguese, Spanish and Italian localization. If you can help translate this mod into Czech or Japanese, please contact either me or Anonymous_Koala on Steam or on Discord: Shay#9164 and Anonymous_Koala#9251 respectively. [/list]
